title: Coordinate with Closing Attorney/Title Company
description: A transaction coordinator must ensure the closing attorney has all necessary documents and information to prepare for closing.

tasks.description: Send the fully executed purchase agreement and all addenda to the closing attorney.
tasks.expected_outcome: The attorney receives the complete contract package.

tasks.description: Provide the attorney with contact information for the buyer, seller, agents, and lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: The attorney has a complete list of all parties to the transaction.

tasks.description: Review the draft Closing Disclosure (CD) or HUD-1 settlement statement for accuracy before it's sent to the clients.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that all figures, including commission, are correct on the settlement statement.
